message: Would you let your children hang out with child predators? If they are on social media or playing certain video games without being monitored chances are they have come in contact with someone whose intentions are not good.

data.description: As moms we worry almost constantly about keeping our kids protected from physical dangers, but it's not always as easy to see all the threats coming at them online.  The reality is that the Internet…
data.title: Keep Your Kids Safe Online | 8 Essential Social Media Safety Tips
